Class GameState

java.lang.Object
group20.GameLogic.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
Holds all the info required for the running of a Game. Modified by Commands

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private List<Category>
    categories
    The list of Category objects being used for the current Game

    turns
